trans-unit.source: Dobrodošli u srce Like, gdje mirisi domaće kuhinje bude sjećanja, a okusi pričaju priče naših baka. Naš Traditional Plitvice Lakes Cooking Class nije samo tečaj kuhanja – to je doživljaj za dušu.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the heart of Lika, where the aromas of home-cooked meals awaken memories, and every flavor tells a story passed down through generations. Our Traditional Plitvice Lakes Cooking Class is not just about learning to cook – it’s a soulful experience.

trans-unit.source: U društvu naše obitelji, u toplini ličkog doma, naučit ćete pripremati autentična plitvička i lička jela po starinskim receptima koji se prenose generacijama. Ali ne brinite – ovdje se ne broje samo grami i minute. Ovdje se broje osmijesi, mirisi svježeg bilja, zvuk pucanja vatre i topli razgovori uz rakijicu.
trans-unit.target: Join our family in the warmth of our countryside home as we guide you through the preparation of authentic Plitvice and Lika dishes, using time-honored recipes and techniques. But don’t worry – this isn’t a strict cooking lesson. It’s full of laughter, the scent of fresh herbs, the crackle of firewood, and heartfelt conversation over a glass of homemade rakija.

trans-unit.source: Zajedno ćemo mijesiti, sjeckati, kuhati i – najvažnije – smijati se. U svako jelo unosimo dašak prošlih vremena i ljubavi prema kraju iz kojeg dolazimo. A dok kuhate s nama, postajete dio te priče.
trans-unit.target: Together we’ll knead, chop, stir – and most importantly – enjoy. Every dish is infused with a touch of the past and our love for this land. And as you cook with us, you become a part of that story.

trans-unit.source: Edukacija i priprema tradicionalnih jela uz stručne i srdačne domaćine
trans-unit.target: Cooking class and preparation of traditional dishes with warm and knowledgeable local hosts

trans-unit.source: Korištenje lokalnih, svježih sastojaka – iz vrta, s tržnice ili iz prirode
trans-unit.target: Fresh, seasonal ingredients straight from the garden, the market, or the wild

trans-unit.source: Kušanje vlastitih kulinarskih remek-djela uz domaće vino i rakiju
trans-unit.target: Enjoying the meal you've created with local wine and homemade brandy

trans-unit.source: Trenuci koje ćete ponijeti kući – ne u torbi, nego u srcu
trans-unit.target: Moments you'll take home – not in your bag, but in your heart

trans-unit.source: Ovo nije samo kuhanje – ovo je spajanje s kulturom, s ljudima i s prirodom Plitvičkih jezera. Ako tražite nešto istinski autentično, daleko od turističke vreve, dođite da zajedno zapalimo vatru, razvaljamo tijesto i zapečemo uspomene koje će trajati zauvijek.
trans-unit.target: This is more than cooking – it’s a connection to the culture, the people, and the soul of the Plitvice Lakes region. If you're seeking something truly authentic, far from the tourist crowds, come light the fire, roll the dough, and bake memories that will last a lifetime.

trans-unit.source: Rezervirajte svoje mjesto za stolom – obitelj vas čeka!
trans-unit.target: Book your seat at the table – our family is waiting for you!

trans-unit.source: Rezerviranje putem stranice uskoro će biti omogućeno!
trans-unit.target: Booking through the website will be available soon!

trans-unit.source: Do tada nas za rezervacije kontaktirajte putem telefona ili e-maila navedenih na stranici. Hvala na strpljenju!
trans-unit.target: In the meantime, please contact us for reservations via the phone or email provided on the website. Thank you for your patience!
